descmd: The January 2024 Ballot Version adds United States Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI) V5 updates that the Assistant Secretary for Technology Policy/Office of the National Coordinator for Health Information Technology (ASTP/ONC) published in July 2024. It also addresses over 50 trackers submitted by implementers since the publication of US Core ver 7.0.0. For a detailed list of the changes for this version, see the [Change Notes](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/2024Jan/changes.html).
desc: he January 2024 Ballot Version adds United States Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI) V5 updates that the Assistant Secretary for Technology Policy/Office of the National Coordinator for Health Information Technology (ASTP/ONC) published in July 2024. It also addresses over 50 trackers submitted by implementers since the publication of US Core ver 7.0.0. For a detailed list of the changes for this version, see the Change Notes. http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/2024Jan/changes.html.
